Each share is represented by a Restricted Stock Unit ("RSU") and a contingent right to receive one share of PANW common stock for each RSU. One-third of the RSUs will vest on March 20, 2017 and the remaining RSUs will vest in equal increments over the next two years on each quarterly anniversary thereafter, subject to the Reporting Person continuing to be a Service Provider through each such date.
/s/ Jeff True, Attorney-in-Fact for Frank Calderoni 2016-03-21
